originalText.text: I've been using Fido & Friends for a few months and they have been nothing but professional, reliable and very responsive. I've already recommended her to other dog parents that I know and would recommend their services to anyone that is in need of a dog walking or pet sitting services. Chandra (the owner) is amazing and it's really obvious that she loves dogs. (My dog gets ridiculously excited when Chandra comes by to pick her up.)

text.text: I've been using Fido & Friends for a few months and they have been nothing but professional, reliable and very responsive. I've already recommended her to other dog parents that I know and would recommend their services to anyone that is in need of a dog walking or pet sitting services. Chandra (the owner) is amazing and it's really obvious that she loves dogs. (My dog gets ridiculously excited when Chandra comes by to pick her up.)

originalText.text: We have been using Fido & Friends for 6 months now and couldn't be happier with the service. Chandra is very responsive to all our requests. She and all her walkers have been wonderful with our dog, Sally. Sally is 16 and has had some challenges with arthritis and adjusting to medications and they have been wonderful in working with her. Chandra has also provided boarding for Sally. It is a huge help to know we have someone we can count on for both daily walks and boarding if we need to travel. I highly recommend Fido & Friends.

originalText.text: I can't say enough great things about this service!  For all pet owners, there is no better or more personalized service than that offered by Fido & Friends!  Owner Chandra's lovely personality and true affection and affinity for all clients, humans and pets alike, is obvious from the moment you meet her!  She and her team of pet sitters and dog walker are all very professional and really care about your pets!  And it is an added bonus to have the country option for a City dog to experience Long Island!  Can't recommend her highly enough!!
